conbody.p: (a) Departments and agencies shall maintain and forward semi-annual reports. The second semi-annual report in a fiscal year shall reflect cumulative totals for the current fiscal year using the formats in Exhibits IV and V.
(b) The reports will be due no later than 45 days after the end of each period designated.
(c) Submissions will be made to the Under Secretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology, and Logistics).
